title: How do I report a player via ticket?
body: Just had a game with a very toxic player harassing me for playing Riven. Gave me a death threat at one point in the game. How do I report this via ticket so I know this guy is banned? Because he's said he does this to anyone who plays a "no skill champ" (Basically any champ he doesn't like). I have screencaps if Riot needs them.

replies.body: Type into google riot support and the you click on categories " I have a question about League of Legends" then near the bottom "Game and features" and finally "General Questions". Insert whatever screenshots you want and submit.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aPxE7z3W,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-06T05:50:42.911+0000)
>
> Type into google riot support and the you click on categories " I have a question about League of Legends" then near the bottom "Game and features" and finally "General Questions". Insert whatever screenshots you want and submit.

Exactly!  Or do it on the post-game screen by clicking on those red exclamation marks to file a report.
I will say you can but riot cannot disclose what they do to the person so you will not know if the person has been banned or just moved accounts

> [{quoted}](name=Radiant Lilith,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aPxE7z3W,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-06T18:56:35.599+0000)
>
> I will say you can but riot cannot disclose what they do to the person so you will not know if the person has been banned or just moved accounts

I should rephrase that. I want to know someone, a human, from Riot looked at it instead of a machine.

You cant, you report them from the end-of-game screen next to their name. 

Riot does not need screencaps, all chat is logged and automatically reviewed if a player is reported. If they acted that badly, they will be punished.
